definition.name: Accordion
definition.description: A vertically stacked set of interactive headings that each reveal a section of content. This is the root component that wraps all accordion elements.

value.description: The controlled value of the accordion (for controlled components)

defaultValue.description: The default value of the accordion (for uncontrolled components)

children.description: The accordion items to be rendered within the accordion

interactions: Can be controlled or uncontrolled using value/defaultValue props
Supports single or multiple expanded sections

definition.name: AccordionItem
definition.description: A single item within an accordion. Contains a trigger header and collapsible content section. Features a bottom border for visual separation.

value.description: Unique identifier for the accordion item

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the item

children.description: The trigger and content components for this item

definition.visualLayout: Container with bottom border that wraps the trigger and content components

definition.name: AccordionTrigger
definition.description: The button that toggles the expanded/collapsed state of an accordion item. Features a chevron icon that rotates based on the expanded state.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the trigger

children.description: The content of the trigger button

definition.visualLayout: Flexible button with left-aligned text and right-aligned rotating chevron icon, featuring hover underline effect
interactions: Clicking toggles the expanded state of the associated accordion item
Chevron icon rotates 180 degrees when expanded

definition.name: AccordionContent
definition.description: The component that contains the collapsible content for an accordion item. Features smooth animation when expanding/collapsing.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the content

children.description: The content to be displayed when the accordion item is expanded

examples:
<AccordionContent>
  This is the expanded content of the accordion item.
</AccordionContent>
definition.visualLayout: Animated collapsible container that smoothly expands and collapses with a padding of 4 units at the bottom
